channel.title: Need a LOT of help making a server please
channel.description:
Right heres how it goes ive downloaded svenscape and i want to edit it but i don't know how
1. To add commands 2. Make it isntaly ban peeps if they use ::noclip 3. Ban Users if they break the rules 4. Change the menu for when you log in 5. make it stop saying this when someone logs in
[name of player] has logged in! There is now [number of peeps online] Welcome To Svenscap3pk Do not break rules ;) Owner is Owner-Sven And remember! have fun !!! on !! Svenscap3pk [name of player] has just logged in The best server!
btw the bits that say [player name] etc. are actaully replaced by there name
6. How to change what it says when u want to log out 7. To change xp the dummys,doors and hay barrels give 8. Add emotes so that you can go somewhere if anybody can help or think of anything else i might need please post
you may call me a noob because i dont no this lol but i aint been playing moparscape very long and am a bit confused lol PLZ HELP :D

item.title: Need a LOT of help making a server please
item.dc:creator: @Lozzoms Lozzoms
item.description:
@Lozzoms wrote:

Right heres how it goes ive downloaded svenscape and i want to edit it but i don’t know how

  1. To add commands
  2. Make it isntaly ban peeps if they use ::noclip
  3. Ban Users if they break the rules
  4. Change the menu for when you log in
  5. make it stop saying this when someone logs in

[name of player] has logged in! There is now [number of peeps online]
Welcome To Svenscap3pk
Do not break rules
Owner is Owner-Sven
And remember!
have fun !!!
on !!
Svenscap3pk
[name of player] has just logged in The best server!

btw the bits that say [player name] etc. are actaully replaced by there name

  1. How to change what it says when u want to log out
  2. To change xp the dummys,doors and hay barrels give
  3. Add emotes so that you can go somewhere if anybody can help or think of anything else i might need please post

you may call me a noob because i dont no this lol but i aint been playing moparscape very long and am a bit confused lol
PLZ HELP

Read full topic
